gdpr.heading: We value your privacy
gdpr.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Confirm all", you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.label: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: Used for cookie control. Can't be turned off.

analytics.label: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Used to control Plausible Analytics, a 3rd party tool to analyze website traffic.

whatForYou.title: What are your benefits when working with Gaia?

card4.description: Electromobility market is evolving very fast. We make sure you are always up to date with the latest technology.

card5.description: Getting ahead of the competition is not easy. We make sure you are always one step ahead.

evidence.uptitle: We are not just another installer
evidence.title: Contact us and see the difference our service makes

card1.description: We take care of everything and we're resolving any issue before it reaches you.

card2.description: Our flexible renting model turns all CAPEX into OPEX and allows you to have the best technology without any upfront investment.

card3.description: You decide on pricing, location, branding, and everything else important to you. We just make sure everything is working as it should.

whatWeDo.title: How is our service different?
whatWeDo.description: Simply put: we take care of everything. We are the single provider of EV charging solutions you need.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: We prepare all necessary projects and documentation. All in accordance with local laws.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: We do the complete installation, including integration with existing wiring.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Once the charge points are operational, we monitor them 365 days a year, 24/7 and send personnel before any problems arise.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: We ensure that chargers are available and visible in all major shipping applications and that they are up to date with any new legislation.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: We ensure that users are charged correctly and that their revenues arrive to you on time.

contact.thankYouMsg:
Thank you for contacting us.
We will respond to you shortly
contact.msgError:
There was an error.
 Please retry later
contact.title: We are here for you
contact.subtitle: Leave us your contact details and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
contact.name: First name

great_experience.title: Great driver experience
great_experience.description: Happy drivers come back and recommend good locations to others.

business_partner.title: Business partnership
business_partner.description: We won't run away after the installation. We are here to grow with you.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: We take care not only of the hardware but also of the software maintenance.

payment.title: Payments
payment.description: However you choose to receive payments, we will make it happen securily and on time.

support.title: Support
support.description: In case of any issues or questions, the drivers will come directly to us.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.description: We will make sure that your location is visible on all the platforms, bringing even more customers.

information.title: Information
information.description: We will share all the insights you need to make the right decisions.

energy_saving.title: Energy saving
energy_saving.description: All our charging points are designed to utilize the excess energy contracted and generated with renewables.

eu_quality.title: EU quality standards
eu_quality.description: All our products are manufactured and certified with the highest EU quality standards.

howToStart.title: How can you get started?
howToStart.subtitle:
You could call your electrician to install a basic EV charger from Amazon, but in reality
the installation is just the first step to a very complex ecosystem.
howToStart.alt: Example aspects to keep in mind

why.title: Why does your business need EV charging?

evSales.header: Because the sales of electric vehicles keep increasing
evSales.description: Sales of EV already surpassed those of Diesel and the best selling car of the world is an EV.

greatCustomers.header: Because the EV drivers make for great customers
greatCustomers.description: On average they are more welthy, spend more and are more loyal.

fleetSavings.header: Because switching your fleet to EVs can save you money
fleetSavings.description: Running costs of EVs are fraction of the price of combustion vehicles.

one.description: Gaia Charge made the process of installing an electric vehicle charger for our co-workers extremely easy. We just pay a monthly fee and forget about everything. It was all taken care of.
one.name: Miracle Martinez

two.description: Since Gaia Charge manages the public charger I usually use, the previous nightmare is over. The availability and speed of charging has improved a lot and the technical service is now impeccable and fast in the few incidents that have occurred.
two.name: Vicente Meneu

three.description: I got to know Gaia Charge as a customer of their electric chargers. I wanted to meet them personally because I had never received such a personalized and professional attention.
three.name: Juan Fernando Bou Pérez

four.description: After years of experience, I can say that Gaia Charge has surprised me positively with its quick and direct attention in any situation (...) I hope that more towns will follow the example of Alboraya and the management company.
four.name: Francisco J Montesinos Ramirez
